SEARCH
Package com.flipfoundry.tutorial.application.web.controller

Class GreetingController

java.lang.Object
com.flipfoundry.tutorial.application.web.controller.GreetingController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/flip/greeting/") public class GreetingController extends Object

The greeting controller implements an endpoint that returns "Hello, `name`!" to the caller. The class uses an atomic counter to track how many times the API is called. The string and the counter are returned to the caller in a DTO. Updates 1.1 - Added a departing endpoint that returns a simple text message Updates 1.2 - deprecated the depart endpoint moving it to a new departing controller. Updates 1.3 - Overloaded the greet endpoint with a new one that returns a new representation. deprecated the V1 version of the greet endpoint and the counter associated with it.

  • Method Details

    • greetv2

      @GetMapping(value="/greet", produces="application/vnd.flipfoundry.greeting.v2+json") public reactor.core.publisher.Mono<GreetingDTOV2> greetv2(@RequestParam(value="name",defaultValue="World") String name)

      Greeting resource greet endpoint (V2). Scope is Get. Returns a simple greeting DTO.

      Parameters:
      name - An optional name parameter for the greeting
      Returns:
      mono The greeting DTO V2 containing the template string Hello, name
      Since:
      1.3
      See Also:
      • GreetingDTOV2

    • greet

      @Deprecated(since="1.3", forRemoval=false) @GetMapping(value="/greet", produces="application/vnd.flipfoundry.greeting.v1+json") public reactor.core.publisher.Mono<GreetingDTO> greet(@RequestParam(value="name",defaultValue="World") String name)
      Deprecated.
      As of release 1.3, use greetv2(String) instead

      Greeting resource greet endpoint (V1 - Deprecated). Scope is Get. Returns a greeting DTO with counter.

      Parameters:
      name - An optional name parameter for the greeting
      Returns:
      mono The greeting DTO containing a static long counter and the template string Hello, name
      Since:
      1.0
      See Also:
      • GreetingDTO

    • depart

      @Deprecated(since="1.2", forRemoval=true) @GetMapping(value="/depart", produces="application/vnd.flipfoundry.greeting.v1+json") public reactor.core.publisher.Mono<DepartDTO> depart()
      Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
      As of release 1.2, use DepartController.depart() instead

      Depart endpoint (Deprecated - moved to DepartController).

      Returns:
      mono The Depart DTO.
      Since:
      1.1
